В ларьке с горячими пирожками всегда есть деньги.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkDishonest],Непорядочность]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMerchant],Торговец]]
Оборудование: 3 миллиона [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCBill],C-bills]] (или местный эквивалент)

content.original:
You signed on as a guard for a small trading guild, providing security as the guild's caravan made trading runs between the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Periphery]]. It was a largely uneventful life, but you were able to put your MechWarrior skills to good use in the occasional scuffle with pirates and uncooperative local governments.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]]
content.prevOriginal:
You signed on as a guard for a small trading guild, providing security as the guild's caravan made trading runs between the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Periphery]]. It was a largely uneventful life, but you were able to put your MechWarrior skills to good use in the occasional scuffle with pirates and uncooperative local governments.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]]
content.content:
Вы поступили на работу охранником в небольшую гильдию торговцев, обеспечивая безопасность их караванов, совершавших торговые рейсы между [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Внутренней Сферой]] и [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Периферией]]. Это была в основном безмятежная жизнь, но вам также удалось применить свои навыки мехвоина в случайных стычках с пиратами и несговорчивыми местными властями.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]]

content.original: The school of hard knocks is for people who think that the only way to the top of the food chain is brute force. Officer training school is for the people who know the only way to the top of the food chain is brute force applied by people under your command. You graduated, did a brief stint in the organised military, dropped out, had a jaunt through the private sector, and now you find yourself at the head of your own mercenary company, with a whole slew of people ready to do the brute force for you.
content.prevOriginal: Tired of living under the authority of others, you fell in with a local pirate gang in the Rimward Periphery. It was an unruly crew, but an effective one - roaming the Periphery afforded your outfit with a steady supply of poorly defended merchant caravans and supply depots to prey upon. While raids did occasionally devolve into combat, you quickly learned that successful piracy is mostly about being in the right place, at the right time, with the right threats and a good show of force.
content.content: Школа тяжелых ударов - для тех, кто считает, что единственный путь к вершине пищевой цепи - это грубая сила. Школа подготовки офицеров - для тех, кто знает, что единственный путь к вершине пищевой цепи - это грубая сила, применяемая людьми под твоим командованием. Вы закончили школу, немного послужили в вооруженных силах, бросили, поработали в частном секторе, а теперь оказались во главе собственной компании наемников, с целым штатом людей, готовых применить грубую силу вместо вас.

content.original:
Somebody's gotta keep the kids in line.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkCommand],Commander]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkOfficer],Officer]]
Unit: choice of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StarterBundleOfficer],Command Vehicle]]
content.prevOriginal: Order and Discipline!. Quirk: Officer&Command. Vehicle: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAWACS],AWACS]] OR [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOracle ACMV],Oracle ACMV]]
content.content:
Кто-то должен держать детей в узде.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkCommand],Командующий]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkOfficer],Офицер]]
Юнит: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StarterBundleOfficer],Командный транспорт]]

content.original:
Tired of living under the authority of others, you fell in with a local pirate gang in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]]. It was an unruly crew, but an effective one - roaming the Periphery afforded your outfit with a steady supply of poorly defended merchant caravans and supply depots to prey upon. While raids did occasionally devolve into combat, you quickly learned that successful piracy is mostly about being in the right place, at the right time, with the right threats and a good show of force.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.prevOriginal:
Tired of living under the authority of others, you fell in with a local pirate gang in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]]. It was an unruly crew, but an effective one - roaming the Periphery afforded your outfit with a steady supply of poorly defended merchant caravans and supply depots to prey upon. While raids did occasionally devolve into combat, you quickly learned that successful piracy is mostly about being in the right place, at the right time, with the right threats and a good show of force.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.content:
Устав жить под чужим гнетом, вы примкнули к местной пиратской банде в [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Окраинной Периферии]]. Это была неуправляемая, но эффективная команда - бродя по Периферии, вы могли постоянно нападать на плохо защищенные торговые караваны и склады снабжения. Хотя рейды иногда перерастали в бои, вы быстро поняли, что для успешного пиратства нужно оказаться в нужном месте, в нужное время, с нужными угрозами и хорошей демонстрацией силы.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]

content.original: You signed up for your local militia as soon as you came of age. While it wasn't glamorous, the life of a soldier suited you just fine. Things took a turn for the worse several years deep, however, and you found yourself burnt out on a gruelling campaign against local pirates who were conspicuously more armed than intelligence would've had you believe. You toughed through it, but swore you'd never commit to ops that you weren't in control of any longer, and founded your own mercenary company far away from the little speck you once called home.
content.prevOriginal: Unsure of your prospects, you traveled to Coromodir, the capital of the Aurigan Coalition, and enlisted in the Coalition military. You quickly rose through the ranks, distinguishing yourself as a reliable MechWarrior. Life as a soldier wasn't glamorous, but it suited you just fine.
content.content: Вы записались в местное ополчение, как только достигли совершеннолетия. Жизнь солдата не была гламурной, но вполне устраивала вас. Однако через несколько лет все пошло наперекосяк, и вы поняли, что перегорели, во время изнурительной кампании против местных пиратов, которые оказались вооружены гораздо лучше, чем можно было предположить по данным разведки. Вы выстояли, но поклялись, что больше никогда не будете участвовать в операциях, которые не контролируете, и основали собственную компанию наемников, подальше от маленького городка, который вы когда-то звали домом.

content.original:
War. War never changes. But, by God, do we wish it did.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Brave]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMilitary],Ex-Military]]
Equipment: assorted [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StarterBundleSoldier],LosTech weaponry]]
content.prevOriginal: Enlisted as a Soldier, War always bring a Paycheck. Quirk: Dependable&Brave. Large assortment of Items.
content.content:
Война. Война никогда не меняется. Но, ей-богу, лучше бы она изменилась.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Смелость]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMilitary],Бывший военный]]
Экипировка: набор [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StarterBundleSoldier],лостех оружия]]

content.original:
Unsure of your prospects, you traveled to [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoromodir],Coromodir]], the capital of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition],Aurigan Coalition]], and enlisted in the Coalition military. You quickly rose through the ranks, distinguishing yourself as a reliable MechWarrior. Life as a soldier wasn't glamorous, but it suited you just fine.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]
content.prevOriginal:
Unsure of your prospects, you traveled to [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoromodir],Coromodir]], the capital of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition],Aurigan Coalition]], and enlisted in the Coalition military. You quickly rose through the ranks, distinguishing yourself as a reliable MechWarrior. Life as a soldier wasn't glamorous, but it suited you just fine.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]
content.content:
Не будучи уверенным в своих перспективах, вы отправились в [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoromodir]],Коромодир]], столицу [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition]],Ауриганской коалиции]], и поступили на службу в армию Коалиции. Вы быстро поднялись по служебной лестнице, отличившись как надежный мехвоин. Жизнь солдата не была гламурной, но она вас вполне устраивала.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]

content.original: Through many years of exceptional service, you found yourself shortlisted for a strike against Clan Smoke Jaguar - Operation DAMOCLES. Along with three other Second Star League veterans, you fought your way through the Smoke Jaguar chain of command, salvaging what 'Mechs you could along the way. In the final confrontation with the would-be leader of the Clan, your salvaged 'Mech was destroyed, but you were ultimately successful. Now, with your Bushwacker in tow, you think it's time for something a little quieter.
content.prevOriginal: A Survivor of Operation Damocles, you have left your Military past to look for something that less likely results in you getting stranded among Crazy Clanners.
content.content: Благодаря многолетней службе вы попали в список участников операции «ДАМОКЛ», направленной против клана Дымчатого Ягуара. Вместе с тремя другими ветеранами Второй Звездной Лиги вы пробились через командный состав Дымчатого Ягуара, забирая по пути все возможные мехи. В финальной схватке с предполагаемым лидером клана, ваш трофейный мех был уничтожен, но в итоге вы победили. Теперь, со своим Bushwacker на буксире, вы считаете, что настало время для чего-то более спокойного.

content.original:
You survived [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDAMOCLES],Operation DAMOCLES]]. The rest is child's play.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMilitary],Ex-Military]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLucky],Lucky]]
Unit: random [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBushwacker],Bushwacker]]
content.prevOriginal: Veteran of Operation:Damocles. Quirk: Lucky&Military. Mech: Random Bushwacker
content.content:
Вы выжили в [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDAMOCLES],Операции «ДАМОКЛ»]]. Всё остальное теперь - детские игры.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMilitary],Бывший военный]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLucky],Везение]]
Юнит: случайный [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBushwacker],Bushwacker]]

content.original:
You roamed the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]] as a freelancer, signing on for whatever odd contracts you could find as a MechWarrior for hire. It was a solitary life - but as you became more comfortable with the itinerant lifestyle, you found you were able to make a decent living helping the people of the frontier.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
content.prevOriginal:
You roamed the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]] as a freelancer, signing on for whatever odd contracts you could find as a MechWarrior for hire. It was a solitary life - but as you became more comfortable with the itinerant lifestyle, you found you were able to make a decent living helping the people of the frontier.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
content.content:
Вы скитались по [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Окраинной Периферии]] в качестве фрилансера, подписываясь на любые контракты в качестве наемного мехвоина. Это была одинокая жизнь. Но когда вы освоились с кочующим образом жизни, вы обнаружили, что можете прилично зарабатывать, помогая жителям приграничья.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]

content.original: When you were young, you were always fascinated with space. Either you spent your life amongst the stars, or you wished you could.
content.prevOriginal: The rest of your family died in a freak JumpShip accident, after which you discovered they had left nothing behind but piles of debt. After selling everything to settle the debt, you set off on your own, with only your family's ancestral Blackjack left to your name.
content.content: Ещё с юности вы были очарованы космосом. Вы либо провели свою жизнь среди звезд, либо мечтали об этом.

content.original:
Space has always called to you.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkHonest],Honest]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkSpacer],Spacer]]
content.prevOriginal: Space always called to you. Quirk: Space&Honest.

content.original:
The rest of your family died in a freak [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJumpShip],JumpShip]] accident, after which you discovered they had left nothing behind but piles of debt.

After selling everything to settle the debt, you set off on your own, with only your family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] left to your name.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.prevOriginal:
The rest of your family died in a freak [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJumpShip],JumpShip]] accident, after which you discovered they had left nothing behind but piles of debt.

After selling everything to settle the debt, you set off on your own, with only your family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] left to your name.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.content:
Остальные члены вашей семьи погибли в результате несчастного случая на [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJumpShip],прыгуне]], после которого вы обнаружили, что они не оставили после себя ничего, кроме кучи долгов.

Продав все, чтобы расплатиться с долгами, вы отправились в самостоятельное плавание, имея в распоряжении только родовой [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]].

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]

content.original: For almost all your life, you've been drawn to games of chance. Be it simple monetary gambling, or risking your life on the field of battle.
content.prevOriginal: As you grew older, you watched your family's fortune, income, and influence slowly dwindle away - until there was nothing left. Your parents, driven to despair, took their own lives. With nothing but your family's ancestral Blackjack left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.
content.content: Почти всю жизнь вас привлекали азартные игры, будь то простая денежная игра или риск расстаться с жизнью на поле боя.

content.original:
You and old Lady Luck have a complicated relationship.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkJinxed],Jinxed]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLucky],Lucky]]
content.prevOriginal: Lady Luck and you are well aquainted. Quirk: Jinxed&Lucky.
content.content:
У вас со старушкой госпожой Удачей сложные отношения.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkJinxed],Невезение]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLucky],Везение]]

content.original:
As you grew older, you watched your family's fortune, income, and influence slowly dwindle away - until there was nothing left. Your parents, driven to despair, took their own lives.

With nothing but your family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.prevOriginal:
As you grew older, you watched your family's fortune, income, and influence slowly dwindle away - until there was nothing left. Your parents, driven to despair, took their own lives.

With nothing but your family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.content:
По мере взросления, вы наблюдали, как состояние, доход и влияние вашей семьи постепенно уменьшались - пока не осталось ничего. Ваши родители, доведенные до отчаяния, покончили с собой.

Не имея ничего, кроме родового [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]], вы отправились искать новой жизни для себя.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]

content.original: In your spare time, you used to live and breathe technology. Whether you were tinkering with various systems, or scouring through every TechManual under the sun, you always found the technology that made the universe ticks to be fascinating.
content.prevOriginal: Your family was betrayed and its seat of power destroyed. You defeated the betrayers, but you were the sole surviving member of your house. With nothing but your family's ancestral Blackjack left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.
content.content: В свое свободное время вы жили и дышали технологиями. Возились ли вы с электроникой или перечитывали все технические руководства, что видел свет, вы всегда находили технологии, что заставляют вселенную работать, увлекательными.

content.original:
Hardware and software both have always seemed so simple.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLosTech],LosTech Experience]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkTech],Technician]]
content.prevOriginal: Youve always fiddled with your Tech. Quirk: Tech&Comstar.
content.content:
Аппаратное и программное обеспечение всегда давались легко.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLosTech],Знаток лостеха]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkTech],Тех]]

content.original:
Your family was betrayed and its seat of power destroyed. You defeated the betrayers, but you were the sole surviving member of your house.

With nothing but your family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.prevOriginal:
Your family was betrayed and its seat of power destroyed. You defeated the betrayers, but you were the sole surviving member of your house.

With nothing but your family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.content:
Вашу семью предали и лишили власти. Вы одолели предателей, но были единственным выжившим членом вашего дома. 

Имея при себе только фамильный [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]], вы отправились искать новой жизни.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]

content.original: You have ever been looking to the past, perhaps to a fault. Any period of history, be it pre-spaceflight or as recent as the Age of War, has always piqued your interest. Despite not having a formal education in the field, your knowledge of some eras rivals even the most accredited historians.
content.prevOriginal: Once the promising young scion of your family, you committed an unforgivable transgression and were sentenced to life in exile. You stole away with the family's ancestral Blackjack and set off to find a new life to call your own.
content.content: Вы всегда стремились в прошлое, возможно, даже очень. Любой период истории, будь то до космических полетов или совсем недавняя Эра войн, всегда вызывала у вас интерес. Несмотря на отсутствие формального образования в этой области, ваши знания о некоторых эрах превосходят знания даже самых признанных историков.

content.original:
A long time ago, you used to read of times long ago.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBookish],Bookish]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLosTech],LosTech Experience]]
content.prevOriginal: The Past held your Dreams. Quirk: LosTech&Bookish.
content.content:
Давным-давно вы читали о временах давно минувших.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBookish],Любовь к книгам]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLosTech],Знаток лостеха]]

content.original:
Once the promising young scion of your family, you committed an unforgivable transgression and were sentenced to life in exile.

You stole away with the family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] and set off to find a new life to call your own.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
content.prevOriginal:
Once the promising young scion of your family, you committed an unforgivable transgression and were sentenced to life in exile.

You stole away with the family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] and set off to find a new life to call your own.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
content.content:
Когда-то вы были многообещающим молодым отпрыском своей семьи, но совершили непростительный проступок и были приговорены к пожизненному изгнанию.

Вы похитили родовой [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] и отправились на поиски новой жизни.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]

content.original: In your youth, while others your age had myriad interests, you fought tooth and nail to justify your own existence. Life was tough, so you had to be tougher.
content.prevOriginal: As the heir to a noble family, you grew up wanting for nothing. As it turns out, you couldn't stand a life of pampered nobility. Finally, one night you stole away with the family's ancestral Blackjack and set off to find a new life to call your own.
content.content: В молодости, когда у других людей вашего возраста был миллиард различных увлечений, вы упорно боролись за свое существование. Жизнь была суровой, а вам приходилось быть ещё суровее.

content.original:
You blazed a trail through life, sticking to the only guns you could trust — your own.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkReckless],Reckless]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Brave]]
content.prevOriginal:
Hobbies were a luxury you could not afford to have.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkAssassin],Assassin]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Brave]]
content.content:
Вы прокладывали свой путь по жизни, держась за единственное, чему вы могли доверять, - за самого себя.
Особенности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkReckless],Безрассудство]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Смелость]]

content.prevOriginal: Struck Out On Own, Disgusted with Nobility

content.original:
As the heir to a noble family, you grew up wanting for nothing. And as it turns out… you couldn't stand a life of pampered nobility.

Finally, one night you stole away with the family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] and set off to find a new life to call your own.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
content.prevOriginal:
As the heir to a noble family, you grew up wanting for nothing. And as it turns out… you couldn't stand a life of pampered nobility.

Finally, one night you stole away with the family's ancestral [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] and set off to find a new life to call your own.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
content.content:
Будучи наследником знатной семьи, вы росли ни в чем не нуждаясь. И, как выяснилось... вы не смогли вынести изнеженной дворянской жизни.

В итоге, однажды ночью вы украли родовой [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralBlackjack],Blackjack]] и отправились на поиски новой жизни.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorPiloting],Piloting]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]

content.original: Coming of age you choose the career of...
content.prevOriginal: Coming of Age you choose the Career of....

content.original: In your youth you had interest in...
You Reall worked with Dr. Banzai and they even gave you one these fine toys?.
content.prevOriginal: You Reall worked with Dr. Banzai and they even gave you one these fine toys?.
content.content: Вы действительно работали с Dr. Banzai? И они даже дали вам одну из их прекрасных игрушек?

content.original: With that grin still on your face, you follow Yang to the 'Mech Bay. It's sure been a while since you saw your 'Mech.
content.prevOriginal: Let's See what they did to my Boy.
content.content: С ухмылкой на лице вы следуете за Яном в ангар мехов. Давненько уже вы не видели свой мех.

content.original: Tally-ho thats some fine stashed loot ya got here, Boss.
content.prevOriginal: Tally-ho thats some fine stashed loot ya got here, Boss.
content.content: Хо-хо! Поглядите-ка, а тут у нас приличная добыча припрятана, кэп.

content.original:
You nod in the affirmative. "Sounds good to me. Let's see exactly what old Bobbert was throwing at us."

Readying the 'Mech takes another few hours, as Yang tosses out wrecked components and complains about "inelegant" workmanship. The irony is apparently lost on him as he crams the chassis full of rat's nests of his own design.
content.prevOriginal: Let's See what they did to my Boy.
content.content:
Вы утвердительно киваете. «Звучит хорошо. Давайте конкретно взглянем на то, что именно подкинул нам старина Бобберт.»

Подготовка меха занимает еще несколько часов, за это время Ян избавился от нескольких разбитых компонентов и проел все уши про «неэлегантное качество сборки». Ирония ситуации, по-видимому, ускользнула от него, пока он продолжал начинять шасси самодельными поделками.

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Your Hunchback was pretty shot up but we've got it back in working Order, best go over and check it's right.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Your Hunchback was pretty shot up but we've got it back in working Order, best go over and check it's right.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. Ваш Hunchback был в довольно плачевном состоянии, но мы привели его в порядок. Лучше зайдите посмотрите сами.

content.original: You follow Yang to the 'Mech Bay as he rattles off all the advanced techniques and procedures used to restore your 'Mech to fighting shape.
content.prevOriginal: Let's See what they did to my Boy.
content.content: Пока вы следуете за Яном в ангар мехов, тот почти успел перечислить все передовые методы и процедуры, используемые для восстановления вашего меха до боевой формы.

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Thats some juicy toys you got off-planet here.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Thats some juicy toys you got off-planet here.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. Неплохие такие игрушки вы прихватили с планеты.

content.original: You were "Dragonforce"! You were known for using handheld flamers and industrial TSM.
content.content: Вас прозвали «Сила дракона»! Вы были известны тем, что использовали ручные огнемёты и промышленные миомеры тройной силы.

content.original:
As you make your way down to the cargo bays, you open up a little more to Yang about your past, including your callsign and who your main rivals were.

"That was you?" he asks, somewhat bewildered. "Well, I can see why you moved on."
content.prevOriginal: Oh.  That was you?   I understand why you aren't going by that anymore.
content.content:
Когда вы спускаетесь в грузовые отсеки, вы рассказываете Яну немного больше о своем прошлом, включая ваш позывной и то, кем были ваши главные соперники.

«Так это были вы?» - спросил он, несколько озадаченный. «Что ж, понятно, почему вы ушли.»

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Some toys from your Old Unit, eh?.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Some toys from your Old Unit, eh?.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. Пара игрушек из прошлого подразделения, да?

content.original: See what your old pals sent you.
content.content: Посмотреть, что вам прислали ваши старые приятели.

content.original: You nod in the affirmative and Yang turns to lead you to the bay containing the ride in question.
content.content: Вы утвердительно киваете, и Ян ведёт вас к отсеку, в котором находится обсуждаемая машина.

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. 3 Mill straight to our Funds? No wonder we got an Argo.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. 3 Mill straight to our Funds? No wonder we got an Argo.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. 3 миллиона прямиком на наш счет? Неудивительно, что мы смогли позволить себе Арго.

content.original: Trawl the local network for buyers.
content.content: Прочесать местную сеть в поисках покупателей.

content.original:
Your listing for the holovid series lasts a whole two hours at the outrageous price before you get your first bite. It seems that entertainment is pretty hard to come by in this system, or perhaps you found a very dedicated collector.

With the utmost secrecy, you organise a dead drop to prevent anybody in the crew from learning of the deed and cash out.
content.content:
Торги по продаже серии головидео провисели два часа по возмутительно высокой цене, прежде чем хоть кто-то клюнул. Похоже, сфера развлечений не такая уж и прибыльная в этой системе, и вам, вероятно, повезло, что нашёлся какой-то преданный коллекционер.

В обстановке строжайшей секретности вы организуете «закладку», чтобы никто из экипажа не узнал о сделке и не получил деньги.

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. This [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAWACS],AWACS]] should really help to get this company off the ground.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. This [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAWACS],AWACS]] should really help to get this company off the ground.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. Этот [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAWACS],AWACS]] реально поможет нам быть на высоте ;)

content.original: "Well, I'm not about to look a gift VTOL in the mouth," you say. "Grab Sumire to load up the [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_AWACS],AWACS]] onto the Leopard and bring it back up the Argo." Yang nods and walks briskly out of the room on his way to the 'Mech Bay. You wait. A few seconds later he walks back through and out the other door in the direction of the bridge. He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find yourself the proud owner of an AWACS Command VTOL.
content.prevOriginal: "Well, I'm not about to look a gift VTOL in the mouth," you say. "Grab Sumire to load up the [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_AWACS],AWACS]] onto the Leopard and bring it back up the Argo." Yang nods and walks briskly out of the room on his way to the 'Mech Bay. You wait. A few seconds later he walks back through and out the other door in the direction of the bridge. He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find yourself the proud owner of an AWACS Command VTOL.
content.content:
«Ну, я не собираюсь заглядывать дарёному VTOL'у в рот,» - говорите вы. «Захвати Сумир и вместе погрузите [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_AWACS],AWACS]] на Леопард, а затем домой на Арго.»

Ян коротко кивает и спешно выходит из кабинета, свернув направо, в ангар мехов.

Проходит пара секунд и вы видите, как он спешно проходит мимо в противоположную сторону, к мостику за Сумир. Он выглядел раздосадованным тем, что вы заметили его, но ничего не сказал.

Спустя час или около и вы - счастливый обладатель командирского VTOL AWACS.

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Thats a lot of Ammo you've brought with you.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Thats a lot of Ammo you've brought with you.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. Да у вас целая гора боеприпасов!

content.original: Two Snub-Nose PPCs with double heat sinks.
content.content: Две Snub-Nose PPC с двойными радиаторами.

content.original:
Before you commit to hauling the crates onto the Leopard to bring home, you figure it can't hurt to check on the goods.

Approaching the crate on top of the stack, you dial the code you'd been given into the keypad. With a satisfying click, the locking mechanism releases and the lid cracks open.

Inside you find neatly packaged - with notably more care given than you've seen most military equipment subject to - a pair of BattleMech [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSNPPC],Snub-Nose PPCs]]. Inspecting another crate reveals something even more intriguing - Star League era [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDHS],double heat sinks]]!

"Nice," you say to yourself, clicking the crates back closed. "Alright, let's get this all onto the Leopard and get out of here."
content.content:
Прежде чем погрузить ящики на «Леопард», чтобы доставить домой, вы решаете, что не повредит проверить их содержимое.

Подойдя к самому верхнему ящику, вы набираете на клавиатуре код, который вам дали. С приятным щелчком запорный механизм отпирается, и крышка открывается.

Внутри вы обнаруживаете аккуратно упакованные - заметно бережнее, чем обычно пакуют военное оборудование - пару [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSNPPC],Snub-Nose PPCs]] для мехов. При осмотре другого ящика обнаруживается нечто еще более интригующее - [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDHS]],двойные охладители]] времён Звездной Лиги!

«Нормально,» - приговариваете вы сами себе, закрывая ящики. «Ну ладно, всё это - в «Леопард» и убираемся отсюда.»

content.original: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Thats a pretty fine toy they've let you keep there.
content.prevOriginal: Hey Boss, we've unpacked your Stash. Thats a pretty fine toy they've let you keep there.
content.content: Эй, босс, мы наконец распаковали ваш тайник. Неплохую такую вещицу вам оставили.

content.original:
The 'Mech Bay is as stuffy and noisy as you remember them always being. However, your mind is focused solely on one thing: your 'Mech. Walking at a brisk stride you pass the bustling MechTechs, deftly step around various coolant spills and flying sparks until finally you behold her - your Bushwacker. She looks just as beautiful as the day you left her.

"I hope she didn't mind being kept in the broom closet all that time," you remark.

Yang shrugs. "Eh. She had to come out eventually."
content.prevOriginal: Let's See what they did to my Boy.
content.content:
В ангаре мехов так же душно и шумно, как и всегда. Однако все ваши мысли сосредоточены лишь на одном: на вашем мехе. Бодрым шагом вы проходите мимо суетящихся техов, ловко обходя лужи пролитого хладагента и летящие искры, пока, наконец, не видите его - своего Bushwacker. Он выглядит так же прекрасно, как и в день, когда вы оставили его.

«Надеюсь, он не возражал поторчать в чулане всё это время,» - комментируете вы.

Ян пожимает плечами. «Да не. Он всё равно рано ли поздно бы вышел.»

content.original:
You get a message from your Chief MechTech [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Wulf_Lore_Yang],Yang]]:

"Commander {Commander.LastName}, we have managed to re-assemble that mech you had shipped up here. What a beauty she is. Those are some strings you must have pulled with your contacts back home."
content.prevOriginal:
You get a message from your Chief MechTech [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Wulf_Lore_Yang],Yang]]:

"Commander {Commander.LastName}, we have managed to re-assemble that mech you had shipped up here. What a beauty she is. Those are some strings you must have pulled with your contacts back home."
content.content:
Вы получаете сообщение от вашего главного мехтеха, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Wulf_Lore_Yang],Яна]]:

«Командующий {Commander.LastName}, нам удалось пересобрать мех, который вы прислали нам. Получился просто красавец. Вы, должно быть, потянули за правильные нитки с вашими контактами на родине.»

content.original:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Wulf_Lore_Yang],Yang]] continues: "Either way, Commander. When you've got some time, check it out in the Mechbay, and we can look it over, or mix it up a little from stock configuration."


You reply: "I'll be right along, Yang. Keep up the good work."
content.prevOriginal:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Wulf_Lore_Yang],Yang]] continues: "Either way, Commander. When you've got some time, check it out in the Mechbay, and we can look it over, or mix it up a little from stock configuration."


You reply: "I'll be right along, Yang. Keep up the good work."
content.content:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Wulf_Lore_Yang],Ян]] продолжает: «Как бы то ни было, командир, когда у вас будет время, загляните в ангар. осмотрим его вместе, может изменим чего.»

Вы отвечаете: «Скоро буду, Ян. Продолжайте в том же духе.»

content.original:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreTeamBanzai],Team Banzai]] has the nicest toys!
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkGladiator],Gladiator]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkPainShunt],Pain Shunt]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkNeuralImplants],Neural Implants]]
Unit: random [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHatchetmanRT],Hatchetman]]
content.prevOriginal: Team Banzai has the nicest toys. Quirk: Gladiator, Neural Implants & Pain Shunt. Random Hatchetman
content.content:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreTeamBanzai],Команда Банзай]] имеет самые классные игрушки!
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkGladiator],Гладиатор]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkPainShunt],Шунтирование]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkNeuralImplants],Нейроимплантанты]]
Юнит: случайный [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHatchetmanRT],Hatchetman]]

content.original:
Tired of living under the authority of others, you fell in with a local pirate gang in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]]. It was an unruly crew, but an effective one - roaming the Periphery afforded your outfit with a steady supply of poorly defended merchant caravans and supply depots to prey upon. While raids did occasionally devolve into combat, you quickly learned that successful piracy is mostly about being in the right place, at the right time, with the right threats and a good show of force.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.prevOriginal:
Tired of living under the authority of others, you fell in with a local pirate gang in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]]. It was an unruly crew, but an effective one - roaming the Periphery afforded your outfit with a steady supply of poorly defended merchant caravans and supply depots to prey upon. While raids did occasionally devolve into combat, you quickly learned that successful piracy is mostly about being in the right place, at the right time, with the right threats and a good show of force.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
content.content:
Устав жить под чужим гнетом, вы примкнули к местной пиратской банде в [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Окраинной Периферии]]. Это была неуправляемая, но эффективная команда - бродя по Периферии, вы могли постоянно нападать на плохо защищенные торговые караваны и склады снабжения. Хотя рейды иногда перерастали в бои, вы быстро поняли, что для успешного пиратства нужно оказаться в нужном месте, в нужное время, с нужными угрозами и хорошей демонстрацией силы.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]

content.original: After years of working for Dr. Banzai, you have stuck out on your own and were given one of Team Banzai's treasured Hatchetmen as a reward for exceptional service.
content.prevOriginal: After Years of working for Dr. Banzai you have stuck out on your own and been given one of the Companys treasured Hatchetmen for exceptional service.
content.content: После многих лет работы на доктора Банзая, вы положительно отличились и получили в награду за службу одну из сокровищ команды Банзая - Hatchetman.

content.original:
For a battle armor pilot, war always brings a paycheck.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Brave]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkDependable],Dependable]].
Unit: random [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[ConceptBattleArmor],battle armor]] squad
Equipment: assorted battle armor weapons
content.prevOriginal: Trained as a Battle Armour Pilot, War always bring a Paycheck. Quirk: Dependable&Brave. Spare BA suit and Weapons.
content.content:
Для пилота боевой брони война всегда приносит зарплату.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Смелость]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkDependable],Надёжность]].
Юнит: случайный отряд [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[ConceptBattleArmor], в боевой броне]]
Оснащение: различное оружие для боевой брони

content.original:
Unsure of your prospects, you traveled to [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoromodir],Coromodir]], the capital of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition],Aurigan Coalition]], and enlisted in the Coalition military. You quickly rose through the ranks, distinguishing yourself as a reliable MechWarrior. Life as a soldier wasn't glamorous, but it suited you just fine.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]
content.prevOriginal:
Unsure of your prospects, you traveled to [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoromodir],Coromodir]], the capital of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition],Aurigan Coalition]], and enlisted in the Coalition military. You quickly rose through the ranks, distinguishing yourself as a reliable MechWarrior. Life as a soldier wasn't glamorous, but it suited you just fine.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]
content.content:
Не будучи уверенным в своих перспективах, вы отправились в [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCoromodir]],Коромодир]], столицу [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganCoalition]],Ауриганской коалиции]], и поступили на службу в армию Коалиции. Вы быстро поднялись по служебной лестнице, отличившись как надежный мехвоин. Жизнь солдата не была гламурной, но она вас вполне устраивала.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]]

content.original: Following a disastrous mission that saw the rest of your unit all but wiped out, you picked up what was left to start anew. It wasn't easy as a lone battlesuit trooper, but you had experience and grit enough to make a name for yourself and pull a company together.
content.prevOriginal: Unsure of your prospects, you traveled to Coromodir, the capital of the Aurigan Coalition, and enlisted in the Coalition military. You quickly rose through the ranks, distinguishing yourself as a reliable MechWarrior. Life as a soldier wasn't glamorous, but it suited you just fine.
content.content: После катастрофы на одной из миссий, в ходе которой остатки вашего подразделения были практически стёрты с лица земли, вы подобрали то, что осталось, чтобы начать все заново. Одинокому бойцу в боевой броне пришлось нелегко, но у вас хватило опыта и упорства, чтобы сделать себе имя и собрать компанию воедино.

content.original:
It belonged in a museum, but now it's yours.
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLucky],Lucky]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkNoble],Noble]]
Unit: random rare 'Mech
content.prevOriginal: It belonged in a museum but now it's yours. Quirk: Lucky&Noble. Mech: Random Rare Mech.
content.content:
Ему место в музее, но теперь он ваш.
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkLucky],Удача]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkNoble],Аристократия]]
Юнит: случайный редкий мех

content.original: It may have been years since you last spoke to your great-uncle but you must have left an impression or you were simply the only one left in the family. While his passing didn't leave you with his money; it did leave you with some information on his business contacts, his prized 'Mech freshly pulled out of mothballs, and a request to make a name for yourself.
content.prevOriginal: It may have been years since you last spoke to your great-uncle but you must have left an impression or you were simply the only one left in the family. While his passing didn't leave you with his money; it did leave you with some information on his business contacts, his prized 'Mech freshly pulled out of mothballs, and a request to make a name for yourself.
content.content: Прошли годы с тех пор, как вы в последний раз общались со своим двоюродным дедом, но вы, должно быть, оставили о себе хорошее впечатление или просто были единственным, кто остался в семье. Хотя его смерть не принесла вам его денег, она оставила вам некоторую информацию о его деловых контактах, его наградной мех, только что вытащенный из нафталина, и наказ прославиться.

content.original: You took to plying yourself as a mercenary and found yourself traveling the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]]. While you're not the best pilot, you've been lucky enough to make it this far and a gift from a distant relative might prove to be the break you were looking for.
content.prevOriginal: You took to plying yourself as a mercenary and found yourself traveling the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Inner Sphere]]. While you're not the best pilot, you've been lucky enough to make it this far and a gift from a distant relative might prove to be the break you were looking for.
content.content: Вы стали наемником и пустились в путешествие по [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreInnerSphere],Внутренней Сфере]]. Хотя вы и не самый лучший пилот, вам в достаточной мере везло проделать такой путь, а ещё подарок от дальнего родственника может оказаться именно тем переломным моментом, который вы искали.

content.original: They're 'Mechs! But smaller! Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMechWarrior],MechWarrior]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkNeuralImplants],Neural Implants]] Unit: random [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[ConceptProtoMech],ProtoMech]]
content.prevOriginal: You were an attempt by the science caste to convert a mechwarrior to a protomech pilot. Quirk: Neural Implants & Mechwarrior. Random Protomech.
content.content:
Это мехи! Но маленькие!
Склонности: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkMechWarrior],Мехвоин]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkNeuralImplants],Нейроимплантаты]]
Юнит: случайный [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[ConceptProtoMech],протомех]]

content.original: You were an attempt by the science caste to convert a mechwarrior to a protomech pilot.
content.prevOriginal: You were an attempt by the science caste to convert a mechwarrior to a protomech pilot.
content.content: Вы были попыткой касты учёных превратить мехвоина в пилота протомеха.

content.original: In the Clans' mad scramble to find suitable pilots for the ProtoMech project, you were among those selected for experimentation. While you failed to meet the frankly absurd conditions of the program, you became adept at piloting the unusual machines. Discarded once you were deemed useless, you took to the great expanse of space and landed yourself a comfortable job at the head of a mercenary company, ready to put your unconventional skills to use.
content.prevOriginal: You were an attempt by the science caste to convert a mechwarrior to a protomech pilot.
content.content: В ходе отчаянных поисков подходящих пилотов для проекта «Протомех» вы оказались в числе тех, кто был отобран для экспериментов. Несмотря на несоблюдение откровенно абсурдных условий программы, вы стали искусным пилотом этих необычных машин. Но когда вы перестали быть нужным, от вас избавились, и вы отправились покорять просторы космоса и нашли себе подходящую работу главы компании наёмников, место, где ваши нестандартные навыки вновь пойдут в дело.

content.original: You were "Slayer"! Your signatures were large melee weapons, made possible by use of TSM.
content.content: Вас прозвали «Истребитель»! Вашей фишкой было использование больших орудий для рукопашной, что было возможно благодаря миомерам тройной силы.

content.original: You were "Iron Maiden"! Your 'Mechs were adorned with spiked armor and fitted with MASC.
content.content: Вас прозвали «Железной девой»! Ваши мехи были украшены шипастой бронёй и снабжены MASC.
Вас прозвали «Мегасмерть»! Ваш мех был вооружён ракетами Thunderbolt.

content.original:
As you make your way down to the cargo bays, you open up a little more to Yang about your past, including your callsign and who your main rivals were.

"That was you?" he asks, somewhat bewildered. "Well, I can see why you moved on."
content.prevOriginal: Oh.  That was you?   I understand why you aren't going by that anymore.
content.content:
Когда вы спускаетесь в грузовые отсеки, вы рассказываете Яну немного больше о своем прошлом, включая ваш позывной и то, кем были ваши главные соперники.

«Так это были вы?» - спросил он, несколько озадаченный. «Что ж, понятно, почему вы ушли.»

content.original:
You follow Yang down to the cargo bays, passing MechTechs hurrying in the other direction on various jobs.

"Y'know, Boss," Yang begins as you round a corner, "I've always wondered why an infantryman would want to lead a group of Mechjocks. Haven't you spent the last few years tryin' to avoid being stepped on by 'em?"

You blink at the unexpected question, taking some time to mull it over. "I guess I just wanted to turn the tables. Now I'm the one higher up and they're the ones dancing to my tune."

Yang chuckles quietly. "I can respect that, Boss. I can respect that."
content.content:
Вы следуете за Яном вниз к грузовым отсекам, проходя мимо техов, спешащих в другом направлении по разным делам.

«Знаете, босс,»- начал Ян, когда вы завернули за угол, «мне всегда было интересно, почему пехотинец захотел возглавить группу мехводов. Разве вы не провели последние несколько лет, пытаясь не быть раздавленными ими?»

Вы моргаете от неожиданного вопроса и некоторое время обдумываете его. «Полагаю, я просто захотел обернуть ситуацию. Теперь я - тот, кто сверху, а они пляшут под мою дудку.»

Ян тихо хихикает. «Достойно уважения, босс. Такое я уважаю.»

content.prevOriginal: Alright, what the hell is it?

content.original: You and Yang make your way to the 'Mech Bay in silence. Once you arrive, you're greeted with the sight of an oddly familiar BattleMech. Familiar, yet you can't quite remember why.
content.prevOriginal: Let's see what shape its's in.
content.content: Вы и Ян молча добираетесь до ангара мехов. По прибытии вас встречает странно знакомый боевой мех. Знакомый, но вы не можете вспомнить, откуда.

content.original: "Well, I'm not about to look a gift [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_MOBILEHQ_ACM],Oracle]] in the mouth," you say. "Grab Sumire to load it up onto the Leopard and bring it back up the Argo." Yang nods and walks briskly out of the room on his way to the 'Mech Bay. You wait. A few seconds later he walks back through and out the other door in the direction of the bridge. He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find yourself the proud owner of an Oracle Mobile HQ.
content.prevOriginal: Check it out in the MechBay
content.content:
«Ну, я не собираюсь заглядывать дарёному [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_MOBILEHQ_ACM],Oracle]] в рот,» - говорите вы. «Захвати Сумир и вместе погрузите его на Леопард, а затем домой на Арго.»

Ян коротко кивает и спешно выходит из кабинета, свернув направо, в ангар мехов.

Проходит пара секунд и вы видите, как он спешно проходит мимо в противоположную сторону, к мостику за Сумир. Он выглядел раздосадованным тем, что вы заметили его, но ничего не сказал.

Спустя час или около и вы - счастливый обладатель мобильного штаба Oracle.

content.original:
"Thanks for the heads up, Yang," you say. The feeling isn't pleasant, but you feel a small amount of empathy for the machines. In a way, they were discarded just as much as you were. "Let me know when they're ready."

Yang nods and turns to leave. He pauses to clap a hand on your shoulder. "Will do, Boss," he answers, "will do."
content.prevOriginal: Let's See what they did to my Boy.
content.content:
«Спасибо, что предупредил, Ян,» - говорите вы. Ощущение не из приятных, но вы даже несколько сочувствуете машинам. В каком-то смысле, они были выброшены так же, как и вы. «Дай знать, когда они будут готовы.»

Ян кивает и поворачивается, чтобы уйти. Он притормаживает, оборачивается и хлопает вас по плечу. «Всё будет сделано, босс,» - отвечает он, - «всё будет.»

content.original: Two LRM-15 launchers and Artemis IV FCS with ammo.
content.content: Две установки LRM-15 и Artemis IV FCS с боеприпасами.

content.original:
Before you commit to hauling the crates onto the Leopard to bring home, you figure it can't hurt to check on the goods.

Approaching the crate on top of the stack, you dial the code you'd been given into the keypad. With a satisfying click, the locking mechanism releases and the lid cracks open.

Inside you find neatly packaged - with notably more care given than you've seen most military equipment subject to - a Star League era [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreUAC],Ultra AC/5]]. In one of the accompanying crates, you find ammo for the weapon.

"Nice," you say to yourself, clicking the crates back closed. "Alright, let's get this all onto the Leopard and get out of here."
content.content:
Прежде чем погрузить ящики на «Леопард», чтобы доставить домой, вы решаете, что не повредит проверить их содержимое.

Подойдя к самому верхнему ящику, вы набираете на клавиатуре код, который вам дали. С приятным щелчком запорный механизм отпирается, и крышка открывается.

Внутри вы обнаруживаете аккуратно упакованную - заметно бережнее, чем обычно пакуют военное оборудование - [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreUAC],Ultra AC/5]] времён Звездной Лиги. В одном из соседних ящиков вы находите и патроны к ней.

«Нормально», - приговариваете вы сами себе, закрывая ящики. «Ну ладно, всё это - в «Леопард» и убираемся отсюда.»

content.original:
Before you commit to hauling the crates onto the Leopard to bring home, you figure it can't hurt to check on the goods.

Approaching the crate on top of the stack, you dial the code you'd been given into the keypad. With a satisfying click, the locking mechanism releases and the lid cracks open.

Inside you find neatly packaged - with notably more care given than you've seen most military equipment subject to - an [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLRM],LRM-15]] launcher and paired [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreArtemisIV],Artemis IV FCS]]. A second, identical crate sits next to it. In one of the smaller accompanying crates, you find ammo for the weapons.

"Nice," you say to yourself, clicking the crates back closed. "Alright, let's get this all onto the Leopard and get out of here."

Внутри вы обнаруживаете аккуратно упакованную - заметно бережнее, чем обычно пакуют военное оборудование - пусковую установку [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLRM],LRM-15]] и к ней - [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreArtemisIV],Artemis IV FCS]]. Рядом - ещё один ящик, точно такой же. В соседнем ящике поменьше вы находите и боеприпасы к ним.

«Нормально,» - приговариваете вы сами себе, закрывая ящики. «Ну ладно, всё это - в «Леопард» и убираемся отсюда.»

content.original: You were born and raised in the [[DM.Factions[faction_Rasalhague],Free Rasalhague Republic]].
content.prevOriginal: You were born and raised in the [[DM.Factions[faction_Rasalhague],Free Rasalhague Republic]].
content.content: Вы родились и выросли в [[DM.Factions[faction_Rasalhague],Свободной Республике Расальхаг]].

content.original: You were born and raised in the Free Rasalhague Republic. MechWarriors who hail from the short-lived Republic are fiercely independent, and often find themselves at odds with others. Despite frequent arguments and disagreements, they are invaluable lancemates.
content.prevOriginal: You were born and raised in the Free Rasalhague Republic. MechWarriors who hail from the short-lived Republic are fiercely independent, and often find themselves at odds with others. Despite frequent arguments and disagreements, they are invaluable lancemates.
content.content: Вы родились и выросли в Свободной Республике Расальхаг. Мехвоины из этой недолго просуществовавшей Республики - агрессивно независимы и часто враждуют с другими. Несмотря на частые споры и разногласия, они являются бесценными товарищами в бою.

content.original: Do a little video piracy. As a treat.
content.prevOriginal: Do a little video piracy. As a treat.

content.original: As you're browsing the various commercial networks, you're struck with an epiphany. Why sell just one copy of the holovids? Oh ho ho, delightfully devilish, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Surely there wouldn't be an kind of anti-piracy systems in place for a series enjoyed mostly by [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]] yokels. Box set in hand, you rush down to Engineering. Farah looks less than amused as you explain the scheme to her. If her brow dropped any lower it would be touching her chin. Reluctantly, she accepts the holovids from you. "I'll let you know when I'm done, I suppose, Commander," she says with an air of defeat. A few hours later and you've flooded the local market with bootleg copies of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidMercenaries],MERCENARIES!]] Surely this won't cause problems.

A few hours later and you've flooded the local market with bootleg copies of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidMercenaries],MERCENARIES!]] Surely this won't cause problems.
content.content:
Просматривая различные коммерческие сайты, на вас снисходит озарение. Зачем продавать только одну копию головидео? Хо-хо-хо, чертяка {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Наверняка, не будет никаких анти-пиратских мер против дешевых сериалов, которые так любят деревенщины из [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Периферии]].

С коробкой в руках вы спешите в инженерный отсек. Фара выглядела отнюдь не радостно, когда вы объяснили ей всю схему. Если бы она нахмурилась ещё чуть сильней, её брови бы достали до подбородка. С неохотой она принимает от вас головидео.

«Видимо, я дам вам знать, когда закончу,» - произнесла она, сдавшись.

Проходит пара часов и местный рынок становится наводнён нелегальными копиями [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidMercenaries],«Наёмников»!]]

Наверняка, проблем не возникнет.

You were born to fly!
Quirks: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkDisgraced],Disgraced]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[QuirkBrave],Brave]]
Unit: choice of random [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLAM],Land-Air 'Mech]] or random [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVTOL],VTOL]]

content.original: You knew you would fly someday; the only question was how to get there. A chance barfight with a visiting TDF Air Chief led to the opportunity to train in air combat. You took to it as you knew you would, putting up with any draconian policy if it meant more airtime. Eventually, though, your ego got you in enough trouble to ground you from combat-readiness, and you were relegated to the position of Instructor. It took four more years of kowtowing and favors, but you got all the parts in place—nobody expected you to commandeer a bird while quitting the job, but nobody could stop you, either.

content.original: Within, as promised, is the bird that brought you here. You lay a hand on the sleek armor panels, and a smile touches your lips. "I assure you, it was entirely legal. Technically."

content.original: "Well, I'm not about to look a gift [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_MOBILEHQ_ACM],Oracle]] in the mouth," you say. "Grab Sumire to load it up onto the Leopard and bring it back up the Argo." Yang nods and walks briskly out of the room on his way to the 'Mech Bay. You wait. A few seconds later he walks back through and out the other door in the direction of the bridge. He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find yourself the proud owner of an Oracle Mobile HQ.

He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find your company the proud owner of an Oracle Mobile HQ.

content.original:
Tired of living under the authority of others, you fell in with a local pirate gang in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]]. It was an unruly crew, but an effective one - roaming the Periphery afforded your outfit with a steady supply of poorly defended merchant caravans and supply depots to prey upon. While raids did occasionally devolve into combat, you quickly learned that successful piracy is mostly about being in the right place, at the right time, with the right threats and a good show of force.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]

content.original: While once you would've considered the crowd you fell into a rowdy mess of lowlifes and villainous curs, these days you find yourself looking back on the path that led you here. In your quarters, pinned to the wall above your desk, you keep an excerpt from a letter than you feel speaks to the core of who you have become. "Sir: I have received your communication of last month in which you state your intention to hunt down, pen up, eradicate, and ultimately destroy myself and my band of fellow privateers. As an aside, sir, I respectfully point out that I prefer to be called a "Corsair". Yes, I rather fancy that. The term "pirate" is such a widely misused and hackneyed term these days."

content.original: After enduring years of assaults from different clans due to our outcast status, you and your fellow Darkcaste brethren forge a strategy.

content.original: AAfter struggling to acquire quality mechs from reputable sources, you found yourself compelled to turn to the Quicsell Company. Promised equipment and mechs designed to mimic Clan technology, backed by demonstrations from their existing products, you struck a deal. Committing a significant portion of your hard-earned pirate loot, you were at last equipped with the mechs and gear essential for survival and retaliation.

content.original: Bergan Industries was an advanced manufacturing facility, producing such equipment as the Royal variant of the venerable Locust BattleMech for the Star League Defense Force.  Bergan Industries has manufacturing centers on Alshain, Ares, New Earth and New Oslo.  After the Ghost Bears absorbed the Free Rasalhague Republic, Bergan Industries opened new plants on Thule and Rasalhague.  Bergan Industries became a huge part of the Ghost Bear's industrial base. They invested heavily in the company, and this investment allowed Bergan to expand into some other realms.
